SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Utils

Class JsonParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Utils.JsonParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class JsonParser extends Object implements Serializable
The JsonParser class is used to retrieve all the information to correctly build card objects, parsing a .json file at runtime.
See Also:
